short_summary: Seeking Senior Procurement Specialist to develop long-term cloud service procurement strategy.
description: Deliver long-term cloud service requirement through secured cloud-base service delivery models. Develop procurement strategy, solicitation documents, evaluation criteria, consultative engagement with industry, and other procurement artefacts.
full_summary:
TSPS - Senior Procurement Specialist for Long-Term Cloud Procurement Project
============================================================

Tender Identification
-------------------

* Reference number: cb-9134-28242729
* Amendment number: 4
* Solicitation number: 100023429-A
* Publication date: September 15, 2023
* Tender closing date: October 11, 2023, 2:00 pm (EST)
* Amendment date: October 11, 2023

Project Description
------------------

Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) invites qualified candidates to submit their applications for the Senior Procurement Specialist position to assist in delivering its long-term cloud service requirements.

Key Responsibilities
--------------------

The selected candidate will be responsible for:

* Developing procurement strategies and artefacts to support the ESDC long-term cloud service requirement
* Collaborating with multi-disciplinary ESDC teams to assess requirements and identify procurement options
* Creating detailed procurement documents, including Statements of Requirement, Statements of Work, and Terms and Conditions
* Providing consultative engagement with industry stakeholders

Eligibility and Selection Criteria
---------------------------------

Eligible candidates must possess:

* Senior procurement experience in complex public sector multi-phase procurement
* Expertise in procurement strategies, planning, and execution
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

Trade Agreements
-----------------

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

Contact Information
-------------------

For more information, please contact:

Michelle Pauzé
ESDC Solicitations
Email: [NC-Solicitations-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:NC-Solicitations-GD@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)
Phone: (999) 999-9999
